text: Under the Pink is the second solo album by singer-songwriter Tori Amos. It was released January 31, 1994. Four singles were released from it. The third single, "Cornflake Girl", reached number 4 on the UK Singles Chart. The album went straight to number 1 in the UK. ==More Pink: The B-Sides== In Australia and New Zealand a special version of Under the Pink was released called More Pink: The B-Sides. It had a second disc with the album's fourteen B-sides. Category:1994 albums Category:Tori Amos albums
title: Under the Pink
